title: Paidōn nosēmata· = or Childrens diseases both outward and inward. From the time of their birth to fourteen years of age. With their natures, causes, signs, presages and cures. In three books: 1. Of external 2. Universal 3. Inward diseases. Also, the resolutions of many profitable questions concerning children, and of nurses, and of nursing children. By J. S. physician.
author: J. S.
publisher: printed by W.G. and are to be sold by J. Playford and Zach. Watkins at their shop in the Temple near the Church,
